ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I lose my temper when my child doesn't do something I ask him/her to do.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I have pleasant conversations with my child.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I grab or handle my child roughly.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I try to teach my child new things.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I demand that my child does something (or stop doing something) right away.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: My child and I hug and/or kiss each other.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I complain about my child's behavior or tell my child I don't like what s/he is doing.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I laugh with my child about thigns we find funny.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: When my child misbehaves, I let him/her know what will happen if s/he doesn't behave.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: My child and I spend time playing games, doing crafts, or doing other activities.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I listen to my child's feelings and try to understand them.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I thank or praise my child.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I spank or use physical punishment with my child.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I offer to help, or help my child with things s/he is doing.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I threaten my child.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I comfort my child when s/he seems scared, upset, or unsure.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I say mean things to my child that can make him/her feel bad.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: I hold or touch my child in an affectionate way.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: When I am disappointed in my child's behavior, I remind him/her about what I've done for him/her.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)

ElementDescription: When my child asks for help or attention, I ignore him/her or make him/her wait until later.
Notes: 0 = Not at all true (I do not do this); 1 = A little true; 2 = Somewhat true; 3 = Moderately true; 4 = Quite a bit true; 5 = Very true (I often do this)
